body: The remains of Ignace Jan Paderewski, the pianist, composer and first Prime Minister of Poland, are to be returned from the United States to Poland for a state burial, highlighted by a gala "Paderewski Freedom Concert," a half-century after he died in New York City. The move has been authorized by the Government of Poland and supported by leading
title: Paderewski's Remains to Return to Poland

body: On Thursday, Kimson Russell was supposed to celebrate his 17th birthday. His unemployed mother had even scratched together enough money to buy him a much wanted new coat with the Los Angeles Raiders football team logo stitched across the back. "I have the money hidden in a suitcase," she said yesterday. But instead of celebrating on Thursday, Mr.
title: Son's Killing Leaves Family An Angry, Painful Legacy
